sentence.Network_en: European sedge having small edible nutlike tubers.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲的一种莎草,具有小的、可食用的坚果状块茎.

sentence.Network_en: The hulled seeds, creamy or pearly white and tiny, have a mild, nutlike aroma and taste.
sentence.Network_cn: 种子带壳, 呈奶油色或珍珠白, 体积微小, 香味适度而似胡桃.

sentence.Network_en: A tropical American evergreen tree ( Anacardium occidentale ) widely cultivated for its edible nutlike kernels.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种美洲热带常绿植物 ( 腰果腰果属 ),因其可食的坚果状果仁而广泛栽培.
